item.description:
Please consider registering for the Cooperative Extension's 2010 Cumberland County Backyard Locavore Tour which will include at least one full permaculture demonstration site (my family's home on Sawyer Road).

"This event will showcase successful backyard “do-it-yourself” strategies for growing, raising, harvesting and preserving foods to become more self-reliant in meeting your own food needs."

You can RSVP here to indicate interest but be sure to contact the Cooperative Extension directly at 780-4205 to purchase a ticket which supports the new education facility at Tidewater Farm.
http://www.extension....

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Cumberland County Backyard Locavore Tour
